verbose_text: These results were consistent with those from the western blot analyses : corticosterone or chronic unpredictable environmental stress increased the phosphorylation of Ulk at serine 757, induced the dephosphorylation of Beclin, and mediated a decrease in the expression of p62 in wt mice.
evidence: corticosterone or chronic unpredictable environmental stress increased the phosphorylation of Ulk at serine 757
